Cameroonian hubby wanted to wear a traditional dashiki to our nephew’s wedding this summer so we ordered this suit hoping for the best. So glad we did! The quality of the material is amazing, the cut, size and look is exactly what he wanted. He’s 5’8, wears size large shirt and size 34/36 inch waist. The size large fits perfect. Pants will need to be hemmed a couple of inches but overall the suit is perfect. The size chart listed is correct. Definitely measure yourself before ordering. We’re already looking at the other clothing sold by Sea and Alp to see what else we can order.
